name: Listening to Rama
description:
By Hannah Zeng, Yaochu Bi, and Dante Liang.

For Ludum Dare 50

A short game where you try to reassemble a machine. How to Play

Download

You may want to download the corresponding file based on your platform. For PC, once downloaded, run the .exe file to play.;

If you are a Mac user and can not open the application, this is a way you can try:

1. unzip and get something called Rama 3.0 Mac, rename it to Rama

2. drag the thing into your /Documents folder

3. open terminal and type

cd Documents open Rama

 Sorry for the inconvenience. We are trying to fix this for Mac users right now!

(reference: video here or here.)

Control

Mouse to drag.  Esc to quit.

Sound

Selections from The Voyager Golden Record.

A line of dialogue from Blader Runner.

A line from Stephen Hawking.
